original_text: He turned the sea into dry land: they went through the flood on foot: there did we rejoice in him.
korean_text: 하나님이 바다를 변하여 육지가 되게 하셨으므로 무리가 걸어서 강을 건너고 우리가 거기서 주로 말미암아 기뻐하였도다

sentences.original_text: He turned the sea into dry land
they went through the flood on foot
there did we rejoice in him
